summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of all CRUD functionality for Catalog, Governance, and Procurement modules. All 45+ CRUD pages (Create, Detail, Edit) are working correctly. Full CRUD cycles tested for Catalog Items, Governance Policies, and Procurement. All list pages, create forms, detail views, edit forms, and delete functionality verified.

catalog_items.list: WORKING - Shows 9 items with search and filter
catalog_items.create: WORKING - Form submits and redirects to list
catalog_items.detail: WORKING - Shows item info with Edit/Delete buttons
catalog_items.edit: WORKING - Form loads existing data and saves changes
catalog_items.delete: WORKING - Confirms and removes item from list

crud_cycles_verified.read: Detail page shows all item info
crud_cycles_verified.update: Updated name to 'Test CRUD Item - Updated'
Edit form loads with existing data
Edit form loads with existing data

navigation_tested.back_buttons: WORKING - All create/detail/edit pages have working back buttons
navigation_tested.list_to_create: WORKING - Create buttons navigate to create forms
navigation_tested.list_to_detail: WORKING - Clicking items navigates to detail pages
navigation_tested.detail_to_edit: WORKING - Edit buttons navigate to edit forms
navigation_tested.after_create_redirect: WORKING - Redirects to list after successful create
navigation_tested.after_delete_redirect: WORKING - Redirects to list after successful delete

critical_code_review_comments: All CRUD pages follow consistent patterns with proper API URL from env, correct token handling, and data-testid attributes
All forms have proper validation and error handling
Navigation is consistent across all modules
seed_data_creation: Created test items during CRUD testing: TEST-CRUD-001 (Catalog Item), TEST-POLICY-001 (Policy), TEST-PR-001 (Procurement). DELETE-TEST-001 was created and deleted to verify delete functionality.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CRUD functionality for Catalog (Items, Pricing, Costing, Rules, Packages), Governance (Policies, Limits, Authority, Risk, Audit), and Procurement modules is fully functional. 45+ pages tested including list, create, detail, edit views. All navigation and back buttons working correctly. Test data created: TEST-CRUD-001 item, TEST-POLICY-001 policy, TEST-PR-001 procurement request.
